website_summaries.verdict: The complete solution for wine bottle and glass storage in a convenient, small package.
pros: Dedicated spaces for wine bottles and glasses keeps everything separated and contained all in one place

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the quality of this cabinet for the price. Many people said they had a hard time assembling it but we didn't find that to be the case although the parts are not labeled. We were concerned that our wine glasses might not fit because of their height (9 inches tall) but they fit perfectly, all 12 of them. The opening for the glasses is 17.5 inches wide X 10.5 inches deep. It will hold glasses up to 9 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Ter11

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack but a Total PITA to Put Together
customer_reviews.text: The wine rack is nice once put together. However, putting it together was a total nightmare! The backing piece wouldn't fit properly causing one side to not fit. I had to follow the advice of another reviewer and put it together in a different order than the instructions called for. The hex screws were a pain, and there are a ton of them! Also, the stain on one of the sides didn't go all the way down so there's a white line. Thankfully, that side went against the wall so I was able to use a furniture marker to make it work. Once everything was together the unit looks nice and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Friesen

customer_reviews.title: What a Pain! Not Worth the Frustration
customer_reviews.text: This is a pain to put together.Using an Allen wrench to put this together makes this very difficult.especially when the screws are in cramped corners .I got so frustrated by this that I gave up on putting this together and I bought a wine cooler that was on sale at a bigboix store instead.The instructions are hard to understand for the novice.
customer_reviews.author: jpopson

customer_reviews.title: It fills the need...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, they look great from a distance, but up close they are pretty flimsy. The rack that holds the bottles isn't really connected but confined to the carcass. But, it's made in China so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not Fit Expensive Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Youd think the makers of the cabinet would build a cabinet that supports high end glassware (Riedel Glasses do NOT fit). About an inch short of fitting my glasses. I am very upset as I bought all 3 of these as a set and now I have to put my glasses elsewhere. Do not purchase if youre planning to buy expensive glassware chances are they dont fit because these are probably made for the real basic wine glasses. And i have cats so placing them on top I might as well break them myself.
customer_reviews.author: John Perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, nice design, modern, good quality, made in Thailand, not bulky, perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: lisette hendriksen

customer_reviews.title: This is got to be the worst DIY cabinet I have attempted to put together in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is got to be the worst DIY cabinet I have attempted to put together in all of my 35 years of assembling all kinds of wood projects. I was four and half (4.1/2) hours before I gave up. If I had not discarded the box that it came in I would have returned it. This is the cabinet from two hells. Please explore another wine cabinet. I will later take it to my wood shop and use Kreg device to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Good value, decent build quality, its worth a shot
customer_reviews.text: All things considered, its a decent value but remember your getting ready to assemble/build yourself furniture. I now see what some of the reviews comment on the slight nicks and pilot holes not aligning up "perfectly". I'd ignore these for the price is is a decent value. The assembling process was pretty convoluted and could have been much easier with better hardware. But it appears to be made well for the price and is "good enough". Note that wine bottle do poke out a bit more than I'd prefer but totally workable. A small child could easily come by and grab a bottle and pull it out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, and definitely a good look for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what everyone is complaining about - compared to most furniture I've put together, this was a breeze. Yes, it uses an alan wrench (which was included) and there's some tight squeezes, but it was finished and up in 30 minutes. It looks nice, and definitely a good look for the cost. My kit was missing two screws for the wine bottles - I will update this accordingly (and my rating) after I contact customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly & Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and for the price it is nice and sturdy. If fits perfectly in my small dining room corner and holds 20 bottles of wines and enough glasses for my table setting. This was a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great once assembled
customer_reviews.text: Took me about an hour to put it together. Was an easy process just a pain in the butt because its all allen wrench screws that are hard to reach. Otherwise it was easy. Looks good now that it is assembled but it wobbles. The legs aren't even I guess. I put some paper under one of the legs and it doesn't wobble. Annoying but still great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: El Si

customer_reviews.title: Rough Start, but Worth the Finish
customer_reviews.text: The piece of furniture itself is absolutely wonderful, but I must say that it's extremely frustrating getting some of those screws in. They are on the inside which is to keep aesthetics in good order which is nice but unless you got tiny hands you'll have a frustrating time fidgeting an Allen wrench in the dark corners near the end.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Green

customer_reviews.title: Got roped into joining a wine club some months ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Got roped into joining a wine club some months ago; and have been bemoaning the fact that we don't have a decent wine cellar/cabinet for the myriad bottles they send on a regular basis. (I think they're trying to turn me into an alcoholic!) Anyway, this cabinet suits my purposes extremely well - and even holds wine glasses in the top section. Well worth what we paid for it -- and that wasn't too much either!
customer_reviews.author: Divapat from Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Wine Cabinet Rack with high quality look.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wine rack and easy to assemble. It's the perfect size for my apartment and looks very high quality. I definitely recommend this for anyone on a budget looking form something nice and sturdy, don't hesitate to buy it. The shipping was descent and was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Molina

customer_reviews.title: Want another one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little wine cabinet. It was a tiny bit difficult to assemble, just because you had to work at some awkward angles, but otherwise it's great. Doesn't hold quite as many wine glasses as I had hoped (or our glasses are just overly large) but that just means I get to get another one! It's been a great addition to our dining room.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Too much $$ for such poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had very high hopes for this piece. Unfortunately, I was very let down. Parts were missing, it was poorly packaged and the tolerances were way off. It is worth noting, however, that amazon made very quick, easy work of the return.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, but functional
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but it stinks for the first three days out of the package and assembled. It must be whatever they use to stain the wood, but man, does it have an unpleasant aroma. Besides that, it is a functional wine rack. It would be nice, if the rack itself was actual wood and not MDF board, but you get what you pay for. Holds the glasses well and the wine doesn't slip out. Might make a few modifications, but overall, I'd recommend this product. The benefits outweigh whatever shortcomings I have for the wine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quality product solid wood.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasently surprised with the quality of this product. All solid wood and nice color/stain. It was also failry easy to put together with the simplest of tools. Not sure why others had issues wtih putting this together but follow the directions and you will have no issues. Came in a well packed box.
customer_reviews.author: BeAn

customer_reviews.title: Good, but didn’t come with instructions
customer_reviews.text: So, I like the product in the end. But, it didn’t come with instructions. So, I did a big brain move and used my brain to put it together. But that is a pain, so it *should* always come with instructions, or at least have the instructions available online in PDF form. I do like the look of the product and it serves its purpose. If anything changes I will come back and edit this review. But seriously, include instructions for people.
customer_reviews.author: Guyote

customer_reviews.title: Great price for product!
customer_reviews.text: Fairy easy to assemble if you follow the instructions! Very study after done! Even with full rack of wine! 10:10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. Very impressed with the way the pieces fit together. The instructions were clear and easy to understand. All of the pieces/parts were there. Would recommend anyone looking for a reasonable priced wine rack to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great extra wine stroage.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for extra storage for our nicer wine we keep in our basement. Also like the extra room for extra wine glasses for when we have parties. Was easy to put together other than some of the screws are hard to get to, but provided tool worked great, but took awhile because you could only make about 1/2 turns at a time.
customer_reviews.author: gregory gump

customer_reviews.title: Great addition.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased all three units and it looks wonderful in my dining room. The first unit was confusing as far as the directions, but I would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a wine rack that wasn't too large, but enough room for plenty of bottles and other items. This one was perfect! Easy to put together and finish is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I put it together on my own. Nothing complicated, just hard to reach a few areas where the screws go. Very sturdy and nice for the price. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy H

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Very nice quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of this item is very good. It looks great and it's one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Juan in Chattanooga

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great & Sturdy... Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this item. Plenty of room for glasses and very sturdy. Surprisingly easy enough to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Judip

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised by the size and quality of this wine rack. Another reviewer said it was too short for wine bottles but it fit ours perfectly. And I love that there are additional pieces we can add. Took my husband about an hour to put together and he grumbled a few times but it didn't seem like it was too hard. We feel like we got a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing two of the hexagonal screws. Supposed to have 16 but only came with 14. For some reason received 8 of the smaller screws when only supposed to have 4. Unable to complete assembly.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and tight spaces.
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet once assembled looks nice, I gave this 3 stars because of the assembly process. While the steps are very easy to follow, the execution of the steps is not easy if you have large hands as you have to get In to tight spots for the final steps. Other than that I am happy with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Worst assembly ever when parts are missing
customer_reviews.text: The product came missing pieces. After 90% assembled the only thing I could do was to take apart and wait for a replacement which I would have to assemble AGAIN! Customer service member JoAnne was NO help!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Aranda

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought all 3 pieces to this set and LOVE the other 2. The problem with this one is that I had missing 4 different pieces (including the 2 main side pieces) and received duplicates of other pieces.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDY

customer_reviews.title: it just seems like a necessary oddity to get the design like this
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as I had hoped. It did not take much time to build but towards the end a few screws were odd to get to. I do not blame the manufacturer, it just seems like a necessary oddity to get the design like this, just make sure you have a few different length screw drivers. It has held up well over the two months I had it and there were no imperfections upon delivery. You get exactly what is pictured and it worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: great piece
customer_reviews.text: we love this - there were a couple areas that were dinged up, and the back panel just slides into place and is loose - nothing to secure it - so if you have a split home like we do the floor flexes when you walk on it - it will rattle from time to time
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but check measurements!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Our wine glasses didn't quite fit in 3 of the 4 slots so check the measurements exactly of your glasses. The finish was a little spotty in places. But again, for the price it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!! Worth it! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: L've!!! Exactly as described and easy to put together... Easily holds a dozen wine glasses'.. Easily holds 20 bottles of wine.. even more if it is ice wine :)
customer_reviews.author: Holli Hollandsworth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Always nervous about purchasing furniture you have to put together over the internet. But we were very impressed with this wine cabinet. Very nice looking wood, solid and it went together easily and looks great in our "Tuscan" dining room filled with our favorite wines. We had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Fits glassware from another country
customer_reviews.text: Quality is on part for something of this price that was built overseas. BIGGEST PROBLEM - Our standard size cabernet glasses from Costco do not fit. In fact the only glasses that fit are some free ones we got during a wine tasting. How disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Boof

customer_reviews.title: Accessibility to screws ridiculous!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet came WITHOUT instructions. The screws were difficult to tighten, with limited accessibility, not to mention a tiny Allen wrench. Not bad quality, but stain doesn’t cover all of the floating panels. Finish is poor. No durability. Thank heavens my husband knows what he’s doing. I would have had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 out of the 2 1 was cracked and the other was faded two different colors horrible
customer_reviews.author: Edna

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wine Table - Wine Rack.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit to hold our normal daily drinking wine and a few glasses. Looks great in our dining room. Very happy with purchase. We did not get assembly instructions. Figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: CBD

customer_reviews.title: I love the cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I love the cabinet! It’s the perfect size and was just what I was looking for! The only downside was that it came with missing 2 missing pieces. They weren’t super important pieces but I do need them to complete the cabinet in order to hang the rest of my wine glasses. Small disappointment. But I was able to send in a form request for the missing pieces, so hopefully I will get those soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: lovely piece
customer_reviews.text: love this piece. its a little hard to put together because of where the screws go, but totally worth it. looks beautiful. i have all 3 versions together as a set.
customer_reviews.author: prittie

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I could’ve boughten on Amazon thus far! Makes for a great accent in my living room and stores all my wines nicely..
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack, expecially for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This rack look really nice and holds the wine very well. I will warn you....construction is frustrating at times as there are some hard angles to reach, but its well worth it. I am really pleased with this item. Its modular too, so you can get 3 different ones to mix and match if you like!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Napier

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Pieces missing on delivery. Incredibly difficult to put together. Finish is uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing in my home!
customer_reviews.text: I bought all 3 attachments and have had them about a year now. I love them- great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Larson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Top Panel
customer_reviews.text: Top Panel missing wine holder brackets, that were supposed to be on it already
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Wine rack is ok, if you have tall glasses like me better get another one. the cabinet is too short for tall glasses. End rings are too tight to hold glasses so im using the base to store scotch glasses. Reviews below are right, this thing is a pain in the butt to put together only to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice rack but measure your wine glasses. It’s not quite big enough for our tall crystal wine goblets.
customer_reviews.author: EJG

customer_reviews.title: love the look but the way it is put together ...
customer_reviews.text: love the look but the way it is put together is kind of silly considering you cannot get the last screw in all the way where it goes because you have to assemble it all before the screw goes in and it leaves this tiny little space for you to work with to get the screw in.
customer_reviews.author: esther fredette

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I got two- one for white and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I got two- one for white and one for Reds.... was really easy to put together but some of the screws were hard to reach because of the slots, but looks great and really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna steen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing is amazing. My husband didn't have trouble putting it together, but did find the allen key to be annoying (since his hands are so big). It is sturdy and the quality is much better than expected. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shelpman

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This wine cabinet is perfect for the price! While it wasn't the easiest to assemble it wasn't terrible either. A sturdy and nice looking piece!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet was an excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was an excellent product for the price. However, it takes a long time to assemble due to having to fit regular sized adult hands in VERY small and awkward spaces to insert screws.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I was so surprised that it is of such poor quality...
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this wine rack. Having just purchased a very sturdy table I found this wine rack flimsy and fragile now that it is put together. Very, very disappointed. The backing seems to be paper thin and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this piece. If I had room I would purchase all 3
customer_reviews.author: Meca Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was chipped on the side but they were very quick to remail a new one! Was easy to assemble and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Silva

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a year and a half and I’m still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: But looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit of a hard time putting this together, even with help. Can't get glasses into the far right now as it's a bit off kilter. But looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: It was somewhat tricky to put together...took me about an hour and 40 minutes. But once completed it was as pictured. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sorbo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wine storage. It looks very sharp and it keeps all our vine bottle on display. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture. I don’t do well with self assembly but this was doable even for me. Looks good and is very sturdy. Would recommend to someone wanting this type of unit.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T. Preston

customer_reviews.title: Overall very satisfied. Looks nice in the family room
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice assembled. Classy looking. One of the 3 pieces came damaged and it took over a month for a replacement part from manufacturer. Instructions on assembly are a little vague.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not have a lot of room for my bar area. I love the fact that this is perfect for what I was looking for. Better yet if needed I can still add sections!. Love this cabinet....I have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheers👍
customer_reviews.text: Arrive in good condition. Was on sale for minor damage, I dont find them. Beautiful color, easy to assemble, nice finish and termination. Cheers😎
customer_reviews.author: Jose R. Vales

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but a bit difficult to put together. Be ready to be handy or have a friend help. It took me about 2 hours to put together alone. Make sure to read instructions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Marketa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It looks great and is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fawber

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete hardware. Left out four critical bolts, but fixed.
customer_reviews.text: Incomplete hardware. Left out four critical bolts, but replaced them with little hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Goozleberry

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Got it as a gift for my sister's wedding. Both my sister and brother-in-law love it!
customer_reviews.author: Azzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, great size
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, great size, is kind of tedious to assemble also is pretty fragile I thought I was about to broke it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to assemble but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to assemble but it was worth it. Receive tons of compliments. A little wobbly but not not enough to prevent me from purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Britten

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it is a nice addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set my husband got me all three, very sturdy too
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Beresford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to build, solid construction, very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nisbet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is sturdy. It showcases my wine collection and glasses perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Statler

customer_reviews.title: It steady, I had it full with wine bottle and it’s very strong.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this piece of wine rack (1 of 3 pieces) my living room/dinning room is big and I was looking for something small, steady and to go with my furniture and this wine rack is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved this gift she still has it in her livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: msMidnite21

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat hard to put together. Light weight materials leave it rattling glasses when walking by it on carpet. For the price, it's not bad
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time buying. Yes it’s pretty but it is modular furniture and comes with NO INSTRUCTIONS. Also all the screws are allen wrench screws which TAKE FOREVER to screw in!! If you’re in the mood to spend hours being frustrated then this is the product for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheribl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece. 4 Stars because the shelving was about ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. 4 Stars because the shelving was about 1/2 inch too wide and I had to trim it all down to make the back and sides of the unit fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This came earlier than expected and was super easy to put together. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Got it for mom for Christmas and she loved it! Set up was a bit challenging regarding ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for mom for Christmas and she loved it! Set up was a bit challenging regarding the tools and the screw placements. It would be very challenging for somebody with not the best hand/finger strength
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, came with a long crack in the top piece. Only discovered crack after I had put it together. Poor construction and wobbled. You get what you pay for. It looks nice, but that’s about as far as I would go for anything positive.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wine rack.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars was 1.5L bottles have a hard time fitting in the cubbies. Other than that, This has been a wonderful addition to my apartment. I'm able to make more room in my cabinets by hanging my wine glasses from the rack an I can keep everything right there.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatLadies

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, but a pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: I love the wine cabinet, looks great and not cheap looking. A bit of a pain to put together and some parts have to be force in. Overall worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price, smaller( shorter ) than expected. Cheaply made, but looks decent for price.
customer_reviews.text: Came broken with the wood split on one side. Made it really difficult to put together. Ended up keeping just because I didn’t want to deal with the hassle of returning. Looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: however when finished looks fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a touch difficult to put together, however when finished looks fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Simple enough to put together and looks very nice in our dining room. Does not have room in the wine glass storage area for more than 12 glasses total (three per hanging rack “row”) but the wine bottle storage is very nice and overall looks lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet works great. Other reviews indicated that it was hard to build and their bottles of wine do not fit within the cabinet. I don't know what they were talking about. It took me about an 45 minutes to build it with little difficulty. Additionally, my wine bottles fit just fine. My wine bottles are normal sized bottles though and not the gallon sized jugs. If you like your wine in a gallon jug then perhaps this is not the cabinet for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I do love this wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I do love this wine rack. The color is dark but matches oir other furniture perfectly and was honestly exactly what i was looking for. Good quality for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wood, makes it feel elegant. Not like the cheap Walmart furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Mvera

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece. Was easy to put together and looks great in our bar area!
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wine cabinet. It was a gift for a friend and she loved it. Looks beautiful on any room.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Viera

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! My husband had no problem assembling it. The only problem not all our wine glasses fit, only the smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is very nice looking and a great price. It was short 4 screws but I was able to fill out a form online and get more shipped to me for free from the Winsome. Surprisingly, it didn’t take long at all.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
